com.risk.models

Class Continent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.models.Continent

  • public class Continent
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a model class for continentValue, continentTerritory, continentOwnedTerritory, playerOwnedContTerr as its data member.
